Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/58th
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Garfield, 59th and Ashland: due to, street blockage near Ashland/58th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Garfield, 59th and Ashland: due to, street blockage near Ashland/58th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Kimball
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Kimball due to a sick employee. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Kimball due to a sick employee.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
